Thanks for the meal.\""},{"lineNumber":1102,"originalJapaneseLine":"パン、と手を合わせて立ち上がる。","translatedEnglishLine":"He clapped his hands together and stood up."},{"lineNumber":1103,"originalJapaneseLine":"「結局、食いに来ただけか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In the end, you just came here to eat, huh?\""},{"lineNumber":1104,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やる事ぁ変わらんしな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The things we do haven't changed.\""},{"lineNumber":1105,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……そうだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...That's right.\""},{"lineNumber":1106,"originalJapaneseLine":"二人は立ち去ろうとして……同時に足を止めた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The two were about to leave... but stopped their feet simultaneously."},{"lineNumber":1107,"originalJapaneseLine":"振り向いた、崖の先。","translatedEnglishLine":"They looked back, toward the edge of the cliff."},{"lineNumber":1108,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――――じゃあな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"—Well then.\""},{"lineNumber":1109,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――――では」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"—See you.\""},{"lineNumber":1110,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこに、誰かが……とても大切な誰かがいるように、","translatedEnglishLine":"As if someone very important was there,"},{"lineNumber":1111,"originalJapaneseLine":"二人は肩越しに一礼してから、去っていった。","translatedEnglishLine":"the two bowed over their shoulders and then departed."},{"lineNumber":1112,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、お掃除のご用命ですねご主人様。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, your cleaning orders, Master."},{"lineNumber":1113,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どこの…………え、戦場…………？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Where... huh? The battlefield...?\""},{"lineNumber":1114,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お掃除、お掃除……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Cleaning, cleaning...\""},{"lineNumber":1115,"originalJapaneseLine":"お掃除メイドのクリンが、","translatedEnglishLine":"The cleaning maid Kulin was"},{"lineNumber":1116,"originalJapaneseLine":"忙しく客室にハタキをかけていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"busily dusting the guest room."},{"lineNumber":1117,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はぁ、いそがし、いそがし。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haah, busy, busy."},{"lineNumber":1118,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここも、夕方には新しいお客様が使うから……","translatedEnglishLine":"Because new guests will use this place by evening..."},{"lineNumber":1119,"originalJapaneseLine":"　綺麗に綺麗に」","translatedEnglishLine":"Clean, clean.\""},{"lineNumber":1120,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハタキ、ちりとり、ぞうきん掛けと、","translatedEnglishLine":"With a duster, dustpan, and a mop,"},{"lineNumber":1121,"originalJapaneseLine":"その手つきは熟練のもので、","translatedEnglishLine":"her hands were skilled,"},{"lineNumber":1122,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかも雑になる一瞬がなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"and there wasn't a single moment of carelessness."},{"lineNumber":1123,"originalJapaneseLine":"「き、貴様ーーーーーー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-y-You------!"},{"lineNumber":1124,"originalJapaneseLine":"　特別訓練などといって呼び出して……！","translatedEnglishLine":"Calling me out under the explanation of 'special training'...!"},{"lineNumber":1125,"originalJapaneseLine":"　部下の前で、あんな……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"In front of the subordinates, doing something like that...!\""},{"lineNumber":1126,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははははははーーーー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahahahaha—!"},{"lineNumber":1127,"originalJapaneseLine":"　騙されるほうが悪いのだ！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"You'll be the one at fault for being fooled!!\""},{"lineNumber":1128,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう！　っとととと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh! Whoa, whoa...\""},{"lineNumber":1129,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぱたぱた……ぱたぱた」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Patapata... patapata\" (sound of running feet)"},{"lineNumber":1130,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい、俺様がここに来たのは黙っておけよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, keep quiet about me coming here!\""},{"lineNumber":1131,"originalJapaneseLine":"一方的に言い置いて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Having said that one-sidedly,"},{"lineNumber":1132,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはベッドの下に潜り込んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance slipped under the bed."},{"lineNumber":1133,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゅっきゅっきゅ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyu kyu kyu...\" (sound of crawling)"},{"lineNumber":1134,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ここかーー、ランス！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Here you are— Rance!\""},{ "lineNumber":1135,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………ち。隠れたな？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Tch. You hid, huh?"},{"lineNumber":1136,"originalJapaneseLine":"　しかし、部屋の中にいるはずだ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"But you should be in the room...\""},{ "lineNumber":1137,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふきふきふき……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fuki fuki fuki...\" (wiping sound)"},{ "lineNumber":1138,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そこの君。ランスが……城主が来たな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey you there. Rance... the lord has come, right?\""},{ "lineNumber":1139,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ごしごしごし……あっ、しつこいの取れた」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Goshi goshi goshi... Ah, that stubborn dirt came off.\""},{"lineNumber":1140,"originalJapaneseLine":"「君！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっはは。相変わらずだな」
「今さら何を」
積極的に言葉を交わすでもなく、
二人の魔人はそこで、穏やかな風に吹かれる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the two demons were there, blown by a gentle breeze.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの日も……このような日だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That day too... was a day like this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 3000年経ち……世がどう変わろうと――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Three thousand years have passed... no matter how the world changes—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むぐあぐ…………んを？
あー、そだな」
ガルティアは、その場に腰を下ろして
食事をしていた。
「ふ。お前には負けるよ。獣の王」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph. I lose to you, King of Beasts."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっは、懐かしい呼び名だ。夜の王、だっけか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haha, what a nostalgic name. The King of Night, was it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前、それをずーっと続けたもんな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You kept that up all this time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「互いにな。
それが性-ｻｶﾞ-であったと、いうことだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That is what you might call our nature."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンクが使徒以外と言葉を交わすのも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For Kessellink to exchange words with anyone other than his apostles,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアが言葉少なであるのも、希有な事。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and for Galtia to be so laconic, was a rare thing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だがそれを驚く者はなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, no one was surprised by that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ風の音と、ガルティアの食事の音だけが響く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: only the sound of the wind and Galtia eating echoed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んむ、んぐ……ふぅ。ごっそさん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mmm, ng... phew. Thanks for the meal."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パン、と手を合わせて立ち上がる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He clapped his hands together and stood up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「結局、食いに来ただけか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In the end, you just came here to eat, huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やる事ぁ変わらんしな」
「……そうだな」
二人は立ち去ろうとして……同時に足を止めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two were about to leave... but stopped their feet simultaneously.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 振り向いた、崖の先。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They looked back, toward the edge of the cliff.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「――――じゃあな」
そこに、誰かが……とても大切な誰かがいるように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if someone very important was there,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人は肩越しに一礼してから、去っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the two bowed over their shoulders and then departed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、お掃除のご用命ですねご主人様。
「お掃除、お掃除……」
お掃除メイドのクリンが、
忙しく客室にハタキをかけていた。
「はぁ、いそがし、いそがし。
ここも、夕方には新しいお客様が使うから……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because new guests will use this place by evening...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 綺麗に綺麗に」
ハタキ、ちりとり、ぞうきん掛けと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a duster, dustpan, and a mop,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その手つきは熟練のもので、
しかも雑になる一瞬がなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and there wasn't a single moment of carelessness.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「き、貴様ーーーーーー！
特別訓練などといって呼び出して……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Calling me out under the explanation of 'special training'...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部下の前で、あんな……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In front of the subordinates, doing something like that...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははははははーーーー！
騙されるほうが悪いのだ！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You'll be the one at fault for being fooled!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おう！　っとととと……」
「ぱたぱた……ぱたぱた」
「おい、俺様がここに来たのは黙っておけよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, keep quiet about me coming here!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一方的に言い置いて、
ランスはベッドの下に潜り込んだ。
「きゅっきゅっきゅ……」
「ここかーー、ランス！」
「…………ち。隠れたな？
しかし、部屋の中にいるはずだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But you should be in the room..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふきふきふき……」
「そこの君。ランスが……城主が来たな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey you there. Rance... the lord has come, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ごしごしごし……あっ、しつこいの取れた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Goshi goshi goshi... Ah, that stubborn dirt came off."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

「お掃除、お掃除……」
お掃除メイドのクリンが、
忙しく客室にハタキをかけていた。
「はぁ、いそがし、いそがし。
ここも、夕方には新しいお客様が使うから……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because new guests will use this place by evening...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 綺麗に綺麗に」
ハタキ、ちりとり、ぞうきん掛けと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a duster, dustpan, and a mop,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その手つきは熟練のもので、
しかも雑になる一瞬がなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and there wasn't a single moment of carelessness.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「き、貴様ーーーーーー！
特別訓練などといって呼び出して……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Calling me out under the explanation of 'special training'...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部下の前で、あんな……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In front of the subordinates, doing something like that...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははははははーーーー！
騙されるほうが悪いのだ！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You'll be the one at fault for being fooled!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おう！　っとととと……」
「ぱたぱた……ぱたぱた」
「おい、俺様がここに来たのは黙っておけよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, keep quiet about me coming here!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一方的に言い置いて、
ランスはベッドの下に潜り込んだ。
「きゅっきゅっきゅ……」
「ここかーー、ランス！」
「…………ち。隠れたな？
しかし、部屋の中にいるはずだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But you should be in the room..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふきふきふき……」
「そこの君。ランスが……城主が来たな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey you there. Rance... the lord has come, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ごしごしごし……あっ、しつこいの取れた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Goshi goshi goshi... Ah, that stubborn dirt came off."
